problem_text:
(I. Kapovich, P. Schupp). Is there an algorithm which, when given two elements u, v of a free group Fn, decides whether or not the cyclic length of ϕ(u) equals the cyclic length of ϕ(v) for every automorphism ϕ of Fn?
Comment of 2009: The answer was shown to be positive for n = 2 in (D. Lee, J. Group Theory, 10 (2007), 561–569).
V. E. Shpilrain
